name: Blood Vessel
description:
A game about being the nanobot that fends off bacteria and viruses from infecting the victim. Working together with immune cells to do your job as an AFK!

Although tutorial is a choice, please go through it to learn every feature of your character.

Controls are shown in tutorial and in options/help.

Installation

Installer:

This only installs the game, no viruses or malware or anything like that are added in.

For some reason windows claims that it is unsafe to run the installer, just click "More Info" and then "Run Anyways" if you really want to play the game or you do not fear the warning.

At the end of the installation, the installer may go not responsive when it is creating an Uninstaller for you.

To Uninstall, just open the installed Folder and double click "Uninstal".

Instructions to access the game for ZIP:

Once you downloaded the zip folder, extract it, pull out the Blood Vessel V0.917 Folder to your desktop or anywhere else.

That's all! To play, just double click the one with unity icon, Blood VESSEL V0.917

To Uninstall, just delete the ZIP and the extracted Folder.
